Release Name:

Release Type: PC Game

Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 400MHz or better
RAM: 128MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Slyder Adventures_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Slyder is back for more slippery adventures! Bound around inside this exciting maze and gobble up different kinds of food to gain more energy. This little guy can take a beating on those sharp corners but he'll gain an extra life for every 10,000 points! Give this game a spin and guide the goofball hero through 4 different fantastic worlds it's slip-slydin fun at every bend!

#################################################

Q: Is this the full game?
A: Yes.

A: No. English is the only language supported.
